entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Atikokan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Atikokan 9:00 PM EST Monday 3 April 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Local blowing snow late in the evening and overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
